modShortDescription: Adds a flamethrower weapon. You can find it in loot, craft it, or buy it from traders. It cannot be modified, except for dyes and it's own modifiers.
modDescription:
This mod adds a flamethrower [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/). You can find it in loot, craft it, or buy it from traders. It cannot be modified, except for dyes and itâ€™s own modifiers. These modifiers change the color of the flames when equipped. The flamethrower will also deal 75% additional damage to wood blocks.

Does not require restart.

Requires client to install as well as server.

Tested and works with Alpha 19.4 b7

Recommended to be played single player or multiplayer, though it has not been tested in MP nor on servers.

Kudos to the creator of this awesome particle system! ([Flames of the Phoenix](https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/flames-of-the-phoenix-46176))

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/3w4shuth4k22b0n/TelricsFlamethrower.zip?dl=1)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19976-telrics-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Telric](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/telric/)
